Pre-Game Insights: The game is scheduled for September 4, 2024 at Rogers Centre in Toronto, Ontario.
The Phillies are projected to start Cristopher Sanchez, while the Blue Jays will have Vladimir Guerrero Jr.
The Phillies are the favorites, with a moneyline of -131, while the Blue Jays have +111 odds to win.
The total is set at 7.5 runs, with -115 odds for over and -105 for under.
The Phillies are favored on the run line (-1.5), with +131 for the Blue Jays to cover.
The game will be broadcast on NBC 10.
